sentences.en: In addition, Alcott extends Transcendentalism in feminine reality which also adds the readability of the novel.
sentences.cn: 此外奥尔科特在小说中把超验主义延伸到女性现实,这也增加了小说的可读性.

sentences.en: In the theory of technology criticism of western society, transcendentalism is well known for their thoroughness in argument.
sentences.cn: 在西方社会的技术批判理论中，超越论者以其理论上的彻底性而倍受关注。

sentences.en: To some extent, it has something of conservatism complying with reality, and rejects idealism and transcendentalism.
sentences.cn: 它体现出与现实认同的保守主义倾向, 并拒斥理想主义和超验价值.

words.tran_cn: 卓越的；超常的；出类拔萃的
先验的；卓越的，[数] 超越的；超自然的
超越论者的，先验论者的

trans.tran_en: the belief that knowledge can be obtained by studying thought rather than by practical experience
